item.description: 2023年年度计划 自我提升 专业技术 Backend Engineer (Reference Guide of Technology Stack for Backend Engineer) Output: tech blog, project Language Low-level system programming Go Rust Functional programming Elixir Ruby (work requirement) Architecture Microservice DDD Design Patterns Clean Code Middleware / Shared Components PostgreSQL Redis Kafka Kong Cloud-Native kubernetes DevOps Github Actions GitOps OpenTelemetry Tools Doom Emacs 人文修养 Output：读书笔记 思维方法论 麦肯锡思维 职业发展 professional career ladder
